div.h2: Full Stack Software Engineer - Universal Media

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: We are looking for an outstanding software engineer to join the Apple Universal Media team and help us build the next generation products that change the way millions of users consume video. As a Software Engineer at Apple, you will be owning key modules of the product and be responsible for delivering industry grade quality solutions.

ul.li: 5+ years experience in a professional, programming position
Proficient in Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
Experience creating applications using javascript web frameworks (e.g.:AngularJS, Bower, NPM, Webpack, Grunt)
Experience with relational and non-relational data stores (e.g.: Oracle, Cassandra, Redis)
Great understanding of MVC patterns for web applications
Familiarity with version control systems such as Git

div.p: Candidate should be a self-starting, energetic individual with excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with all levels of the organization. The candidate should have years of experience developing web applications. The ability to be an excellent team player under tight deadline constraints in addition to the ability to tackle problems with imaginative solutions is key to success in this position.
BS in Computer Science, Mathematics, or EE, or relevant industry experience is required, MS in Computer Science or related technical field is desired, or equivalent experience.

Knowledge of SQL and ER modeling
Experience with Java, Scala
iOS development
Affinity to great user experience
Familiarity with the media space
